titleStmt.title: Analogia honorum, or, A treatise of honour and nobility, according to the laws and customes of England collected out of the most authentick authors, both ancient and modern : in two parts : the first containing honour military, and relateth to war, the second, honour civil, and relateth
titleStmt.author: Logan, John, 17th cent.
Blome, Richard, d. 1705.

notesStmt.note: Wood attributes the authorship of this treatise to Richard Blome. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
